model: sig User { follows : set User, sees : set Photo, posts : set Photo, suggested : set User } sig Influencer extends User {} sig Photo { date : one Day } sig Ad extends Photo {} sig Day {}

requirements.description: Every photo is posted by one user
Users can see ads posted by everyone, but only see non ads posted by followed users
If a user posts an ad then all its posts should be labeled as ads
Influencers are followed by everyone else
Suggested are other users followed by followed users, but not yet followed
A user only sees ads from followed or suggested users
